etomica.lattice

Class LatticeCubicSimple

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.lattice.BravaisLattice
      • etomica.lattice.LatticeCubicSimple
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AbstractLattice, CubicLattice, SpaceLattice, java.io.Serializable

    public class LatticeCubicSimple
extends BravaisLattice
implements CubicLattice
    A simple cubic lattice, with one site per cubic unit cell.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LatticeCubicSimple(ISpace space)
      Simple 3D cubic lattice with a unit lattice constant.
      LatticeCubicSimple(ISpace space, double latticeConstant)
      Makes a simple cubic lattice of a spatial dimension given by the first argument, and with the given lattice constant.

      Returns 1.

      Accesses the size of the unit cell, the length of each edge of a single cell.
      void scaleBy(double scaleFactor)
      Rescales the lattice by the given factor.
      void setLatticeConstant(double latticeConstant)
      The lattice constant is the size of the cubic primitive vectors.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LatticeCubicSimple

        public LatticeCubicSimple(ISpace space)
        Simple 3D cubic lattice with a unit lattice constant.

      • LatticeCubicSimple

        public LatticeCubicSimple(ISpace space,
                          double latticeConstant)
        Makes a simple cubic lattice of a spatial dimension given by the first argument, and with the given lattice constant.
        Parameters:
        space: - space of lattice; values of 2D or 3D are expected, 1D might also work
        latticeConstant - spacing between adjacent lattice sites
